column4: hi i keep on gettting Authentication failure when trying to change to root in a terminal but I know for certain what my password is can anyone help
how are you "trying to change to a root terminal" ?
the root account is disabled use sudo
don't do that
just use sudo -i if you need a root shell
but in general it's advised to just prefix your commands with sudo
then type sudo /path/to/priviliged/command
then type your password
be careful moving things around as root
are these files/directories in your home directory?
just use chown -R youruser:youruser /home/youruser
but put sudo in front of it
that will fix it
it's the same as your username usually
yes
right click the file and tell me what the permissions are
and the owner/group
and what directory is the file in ?
ok, what are the permissions on the My Music directory?
and your user is the owner/group for the files and directories?
what did you see?
chmod changes permissions chown changes ownership
